long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless Pipedrive integration with LinkedIn.

LinkMatch Chrome extension for Pipedrive automatically shows which LinkedIn profiles(people or organizations) are in your Pipedrive database. The Contacts and Organizations are shown in different colors which makes it easy to grasp at glance.

Also, LinkMatch allows to view and edit the profile info of the existed Pipedrive profiles right in the LinkedIn, without switching the Pipedrive tab.

You don't have to manually check the LinkedIn profiles anymore, you can just  connect with new leads right away.

By installing this Chrome Extension you agree to the Terms of Service - linkmatch.net/terms


Browser permissions description for compliance with Chrome WebStore policies:

- tabs: for finding a tabs which has LinkedIn or Xing launched to show notification if needed
- notifications: show notifications when profile action is completed
- https://*.linkedin.com/* - to be able to make requests to linkedin.com
- https://*.xing.com/* - to be able to make requests to xing
- https://*.pipedrive.com/* - to be able to make requests to Pipedrive API
- https://*.linkmatch.net/* - API calls to LinkMatch(application server)
